alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 11:02PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Yuma, northwestern Hitchcock and Dundy Counties through 1045 PM MDT/1145 PM CDT/... At 1002 PM MDT/1102 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles north of Palisade to 5 miles west of Wray. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Palisade around 1110 PM CDT. This includes Highway 385 between mile markers 237 and 260. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
